## Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

* In contrast to **confirmatory** data analysis

```{dot}
digraph G {
  rankdir=LR;
  nodedir=LR;
  nodesep=0.5;
  ranksep=0.5;
  overlap=false;
  forcelabels=true;
  Import -> Tidy;
	
  subgraph cluster_2 {
    label = "Understand";
    subgraph cluster_0 {
      label = "Exploratory";
      margin = 18;
      labeljust="center";
      V[label="Visualize"];
      gg[label="ggplot",fontname="Courier New",penwidth=0]
    }
    subgraph cluster_1 {
      Model;
      label = "Confirmatory";
      margin = 18;
      e10[label="e1071",penwidth=0,fontname="Courier New"]
    }
  }
  
  Tidy -> V;
  V -> Model;
  Model -> V;
  Model -> Communicate;
}
```
